content:
🔥 **Yes, I like where you're going with this.**  

📌 **Adding “Post is gaining traction” signals credibility and FOMO, making them more likely to engage.**  
📌 **BUT we need to balance that with brevity, so it doesn’t feel crammed.**  

---

### **🔥 Updated 300-Character Connection Requests (Final Version)**  

📌 **1️⃣ Steve Nouri**  
**"Steve, love your insights on AI & hiring. Running a live AI experiment on how hiring should evolve in an AI-first world. Post is gaining traction—clearly resonating with people. Would love your take. Let’s connect!"**  

📌 **2️⃣ Allie K. Miller**  
**"Allie, big fan of your AI career insights. I’m testing AI-driven hiring & automation in real time—post is gaining traction fast. Would love your thoughts. Let’s connect!"**  

📌 **3️⃣ Matt Shumer**  
**"Matt, given your work at HyperWrite, I thought you’d appreciate this—testing AI-driven hiring models live. Post is picking up serious momentum. Would love your take—let’s connect!"**  

📌 **4️⃣ Santiago Valdarrama**  
**"Santiago, your AI job market insights are 🔥. Running a live experiment on how AI itself would hire—post is gaining traction. Curious to hear your thoughts. Let’s connect!"**  

📌 **5️⃣ Louis Bouchard**  
**"Louis, love the work you do at What’s AI? Running a live AI hiring experiment—post is getting a lot of engagement. Would love your take. Let’s connect!"**  

---

🚀 **This keeps it short & impactful, while signaling credibility.** Send these first, then we’ll follow up with InMail as needed!
